definition: interjection of surprise/Oh my!
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection of surprise/Ah!/Oh!
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)

sentences.english: Ah ah ah, fruit trees on the long ball.
sentences.chinese: 啊呀呀，果樹上長皮球了。

sentences.english: Cor blimey I better get the defrag right.
sentences.chinese: 肺心病啊呀我還是得到整理的權利。

sentences.english: Oh, no! Now I can't find my money.
sentences.chinese: 啊呀不好，我的錢找不到了。

sentences.english: Oh dear, I'm late. I have to be in the office by 8am.
sentences.chinese: 啊呀不得了，我晚了，我必須要在早上八點到辦公室。

sentences.english: Peter: Oh dear, I'm late. I have to be in the office by 8am.
sentences.chinese: 啊呀不得了，我晚了，我必須要在早上八點到辦公室。

sentences.english: Oh you look awful! What's the matter?
sentences.chinese: 啊呀，你的氣色看上去很差，怎麼了？

definition: hey/ow/ouch/interjection of pain or surprise
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
(interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
interjection of surprise or pain/Oh/Ow/My goodness!
interjection of pain or surprise/also written 哎喲|哎哟
hey (to call sb)
hey (to express agreement)
hey (to express disagreement)
hey (to express surprise)
sigh (to express regret)
sound of crying
(interjection expressing surprise) oh!/wow!
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
expression of surprise
(onom.) expressing admiration or surprise/sound of a laugh
onomat. for surprise, amazement and sigh
Good gracious!/For goodness sake!
modal particle expressing exclamation
see 咧咧[lie1 lie1]
to draw back the corners of one's mouth
gosh!/oh no!/darn!
